General.Name: Tian Di Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Tiandi Science & Technology Co.Ltd engages in the research and development of coal engineering technology, equipment development, engineering contracting, and professional service businesses in China and internationally. It develops and manufactures mining, transportation and support, open-pit mining, coal mine automation, electro-hydraulic control, and other equipment, as well as offers professional services in coal mining, support, transportation, and upgrading. The company also provides mine integrated automation systems, coal mine safety automation network monitoring systems, safety instrumentation, and drilling technology and equipment, as well as mine water hazard prevention and coalbed methane (gas) extraction products. In addition, it is involved in the collection of energy conservation and environmental protection, coal chemical, and technical activities; and new energy development business. Further, the company engages in the provision of engineering project contracting services; construction of coal mine demonstration projects; coal mine production and operation; and treatment of coal mining subsidence areas. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, China. Tiandi Science & Technology Co.Ltd is a subsidiary of China Coal Science and Technology Co., Ltd.
